verses.english: By the sky containing great stars
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da sama mai taurãrin lissafin shekara.

verses.english: And [by] the promised Day
verses.hausa: Da yinin da aka yi alkawarin zuwansa,

verses.english: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
verses.hausa: Da yini mai shaidu, da yini da ake halarta a cikinsa

verses.english: Cursed were the companions of the trench
verses.hausa: An la'ani mutãnen rãmi.

verses.english: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
verses.hausa: Wato wuta wadda aka hura.

verses.english: When they were sitting near it
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da suke a kan (gefen) ta a zazzaune.

verses.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.english: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
verses.hausa: Alhãli sũ, bisa ga abin da suke aikatãwa ga mũminai, sunã halarce.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.english: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
verses.hausa: Kuma ba su tuhumce su ba, fãce kawai domin sun yi ĩmãni da Allah Mabuwãyi, wanda ake gõdewa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.english: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
verses.hausa: Wanda Yake shi ne da mulkin sammai da ƙasa, kuma Allah a kan kõme halarce Yake.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.english: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suka fitini mũminai maza da mũminai mãta, sa'an nan ba su tũba ba to, sunã da azãbar Jahannama, kuma sunã da azãbar gõbara.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.english: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, sunã da gidãjen Aljanna, ƙoramu na gudãna daga ƙarƙashin gidãjen. Wancan abu fa shi ne rabo babba.

verses.english: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne damƙar Ubangijinka mai tsanani ce ƙwarai.

verses.english: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Shĩ, Shi ne Mai ƙãga halitta, kuma Ya mayar da ita (bãyan mutuwa).

verses.english: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
verses.hausa: Kuma Shi ne Mai gãfara, Mai bayyana sõyayya.

verses.english: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
verses.hausa: Mai Al'arshi mai girma

verses.english: Effecter of what He intends.
verses.hausa: Mai aikatãwa ga abin da Yake nufi.

verses.english: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
verses.hausa: Ko lãbãrin rundanõni yã zo maka.

verses.english: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
verses.hausa: Fir'auna da samũdãwa?

verses.english: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
verses.hausa: Ã'aha! waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã cikin ƙaryatãwa.

verses.english: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
verses.hausa: Alhãli, Allah daga bãyansu, Mai kẽwaye su ne (da saninSa).

verses.english: But this is an honored Qur'an
verses.hausa: Ã'aha! Shi Alƙur'ãni ne mai girma.

verses.english: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
verses.hausa: A cikin Allo tsararre.
